{# render #} {% type S struct{A int} %} {% var str0 = "" %} {% var str1 = "abc" %} {% var str2 = "bc" %} {% var str3 = "cd" %} {% var rune1 = 'a' %} {% var rune2 = 'd' %} {% var int1 = 97 %} {% var int2 = 100 %} {% var uint1 uint = 97 %} {% var uint2 uint = 100 %} {% var float1 = 12.67 %} {% var float2 = 5.03 %} {% var struct1 = S{5} %} {% var struct2 = S{8} %} {% var sliceNil []int = nil %} {% var slice0 = []int{} %} {% var slice1 = []int{97, 98} %} {% var usliceNil []uint = nil %} {% var uslice0 = []uint{} %} {% var uslice1 = []uint{97, 98} %} {% var array0 = [1]int{0} %} {% var array1 = [2]int{97, 98} %} {% var uarray = [2]uint{97, 98} %} {% var map0 = map[int]bool{} %} {% var map1 = map[int]bool{97:true, 98: true} %} {% var mapNil map[int]bool = nil %} {% var mapS0 = map[string]bool{} %} {% var mapS1 = map[string]bool{"abc":true, "cd": true} %} {% var mapSNil map[string]bool = nil %} {% var mapF0 = map[float64]bool{} %} {% var mapF1 = map[float64]bool{12.67:true, 9.12: true} %} {% var mapFNil map[float64]bool = nil %} {% var mapSt0 = map[S]bool{} %} {% var mapSt1 = map[S]bool{S{A: 5}: true, S{A: 7}: true} %} {% var mapStNil map[S]bool = nil %} ## String/String {% if ok := str1 contains str0; ok %}str1 contains str0{% end %} {% if ok := str1 contains str2; ok %}str1 contains str2{% end %} {% if ok := str1 contains str3; ok %}str1 contains str3{% end %} {% if ok := str0 contains str3; ok %}str0 contains str3{% end %} {% if ok := str1 contains "" ; ok %}str1 contains ""{% end %} {% if ok := str1 contains "bc"; ok %}str1 contains "bc"{% end %} {% if ok := str1 contains "cd"; ok %}str1 contains "cd"{% end %} {% if ok := str0 contains "cd"; ok %}str0 contains "cd"{% end %} {% if ok := "abc" contains str0; ok %}"abc" contains str0{% end %} {% if ok := "abc" contains str2; ok %}"abc" contains str2{% end %} {% if ok := "abc" contains str3; ok %}"abc" contains str3{% end %} {% if ok := "" contains str3; ok %}"" contains str3{% end %} {% if ok := "abc" contains "" ; ok %}"abc" contains ""{% end %} {% if ok := "abc" contains "bc"; ok %}"abc" contains "bc"{% end %} {% if ok := "abc" contains "cd"; ok %}"abc" contains "cd"{% end %} {% if ok := "" contains "cd"; ok %}"" contains "cd"{% end %} ## String/Rune {% if ok := str1 contains rune1; ok %}str1 contains rune1{% end %} {% if ok := str1 contains rune2; ok %}str1 contains rune2{% end %} {% if ok := str0 contains rune1; ok %}str0 contains rune1{% end %} {% if ok := str1 contains 'a'; ok %}str1 contains 'a'{% end %} {% if ok := str1 contains 'd'; ok %}str1 contains 'd'{% end %} {% if ok := str0 contains 'a'; ok %}str0 contains 'a'{% end %} {% if ok := "abc" contains rune1; ok %}"abc" contains rune1{% end %} {% if ok := "abc" contains rune2; ok %}"abc" contains rune2{% end %} {% if ok := "" contains rune1; ok %}"" contains rune1{% end %} {% if ok := "abc" contains 'a'; ok %}"abc" contains 'a'{% end %} {% if ok := "abc" contains 'd'; ok %}"abc" contains 'd'{% end %} {% if ok := "" contains 'a'; ok %}"" contains 'a'{% end %} ## String/Integer {% if ok := str1 contains int1; ok %}str1 contains int1{% end %} {% if ok := str1 contains int2; ok %}str1 contains int2{% end %} {% if ok := str0 contains int1; ok %}str0 contains int3{% end %} {% if ok := str1 contains 97; ok %}str1 contains 97{% end %} {% if ok := str1 contains 100; ok %}str1 contains 100{% end %} {% if ok := str0 contains 97; ok %}str0 contains 97{% end %} {% if ok := "abc" contains int1; ok %}"abc" contains int1{% end %} {% if ok := "abc" contains int2; ok %}"abc" contains int2{% end %} {% if ok := "" contains int1; ok %}"" contains int1{% end %} {% if ok := "abc" contains 97; ok %}"abc" contains 97{% end %} {% if ok := "abc" contains 100; ok %}"abc" contains 100{% end %} {% if ok := "" contains 97; ok %}"" contains 97{% end %} ## Slice {% if ok := slice1 contains int1; ok %}slice1 contains int1{% end %} {% if ok := slice1 contains int2; ok %}slice1 contains int2{% end %} {% if ok := slice0 contains int1; ok %}slice0 contains int1{% end %} {% if ok := sliceNil contains int1; ok %}sliceNil contains int1{% end %} {% if ok := slice1 contains 97; ok %}slice1 contains 97{% end %} {% if ok := slice1 contains 100; ok %}slice1 contains 100{% end %} {% if ok := slice0 contains 97; ok %}slice0 contains 97{% end %} {% if ok := sliceNil contains 97; ok %}sliceNil contains 97{% end %} {% if ok := uslice1 contains uint1; ok %}uslice1 contains uint1{% end %} {% if ok := uslice1 contains uint2; ok %}uslice1 contains uint2{% end %} {% if ok := uslice0 contains uint1; ok %}uslice0 contains uint1{% end %} {% if ok := usliceNil contains uint1; ok %}usliceNil contains uint1{% end %} {% if ok := uslice1 contains 97; ok %}uslice1 contains 97{% end %} {% if ok := uslice1 contains 100; ok %}uslice1 contains 100{% end %} {% if ok := uslice0 contains 97; ok %}uslice0 contains 97{% end %} {% if ok := usliceNil contains 97; ok %}usliceNil contains 97{% end %} ## Array {% if ok := array1 contains int1; ok %}array1 contains int1{% end %} {% if ok := array1 contains int2; ok %}array1 contains int2{% end %} {% if ok := array0 contains int1; ok %}array0 contains int1{% end %} {% if ok := array1 contains 97; ok %}array1 contains 97{% end %} {% if ok := array1 contains 100; ok %}array1 contains 100{% end %} {% if ok := array0 contains 97; ok %}array0 contains 97{% end %} ## Map/Integer {% if ok := map1 contains int1; ok %}mapSNil contains str1{% end %} {% if ok := mapS1 contains "abc"; ok %}mapS1 contains "abc"{% end %} {% if ok := mapS1 contains "bc"; ok %}mapS1 contains "bc"{% end %} {% if ok := mapS0 contains "abc"; ok %}mapSt1 contains struct{B string}{B: "b"}{% end %} {% if ok := mapSt0 contains struct{A int}{A: 5}; ok %}mapSt0 contains struct{A int}{A: 5}{% end %} {% if ok := mapStNil contains struct{A int}{A: 5};
